BradleyAPCSettings.name: bradley.enabled
BradleyAPCSettings.description: Toggles the Bradley APC spawning function.

BradleyAPCSettings.name: bradley.respawndelayminutes
BradleyAPCSettings.description: Controls the amount of time after the Bradley APC is destroyed, that it respawns. Time is measured in real-world minutes.

BradleyAPCSettings.name: bradley.respawndelayvariance
BradleyAPCSettings.description: Defines the variance at which the Bradley APC spawns. Smaller is less variance.
